issue.title: [CF 993] New Condition - Unit Race
issue.body:
Would be nice for an aura I'm trying to make regarding EMFH


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #993 | Raw

comments.body:
Probably won't implement it as an actual condition. Use this in a Lua condition:

``` select(2, UnitRace("target")) == "Human" ```

Edit: Why am i so bad at clicking the correct ticket status?

Edited Aug 31, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks. I'll assume if I want it as something else, I can put == "Worgen" or whatnot.

E: Can I also assume that "target" refers to the implied unit, not specifically my target? If not, should I replace "target" for "unit" if using this on a unit condition?

Edited Aug 31, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

http://wowpedia.org/API_UnitRace#section_2

Use the values in the second column of those tables for other races.

UnitRace(c.Unit) to check it in a unit condition.
